text: Netizens are eager to learn more about politician Michael Bloomberg‘s girlfriend. The former Mayor of New York City has been a prominent figure in American politics for many years, and naturally, many have taken an interest in his personal life as well. Here’s everything we know about Michael Bloomberg’s girlfriend, how they met, and their relationship history. Who is Michael Bloomberg dating? Michael Bloomberg is dating Diana Taylor. Taylor was born in 1955 in Greenwich, Connecticut. She graduated from Greenwich High School after spending a year at the Milton Academy. According to her Forbes profile, she earned her Bachelor’s degree in economics from Dartmouth College. She then went on to complete her MBA from Columbia Business School and an MPH from the Mailman School of Public Health at Columbia University. What is Diana Taylor’s job? Diana Taylor is a business executive and has held several high-profile positions. As per ACCION’s Center for Financial Inclusion, Taylor serves on the boards of Citigroup, Brookfield Asset Management, and Sotheby’s. She also chairs the boards of ACCION, Hot Bread Kitchen, and the Hudson River Park Trust. In addition, she holds board memberships at the Mailman School of Public Health, the International Women’s Health Coalition, the Council on Foreign Relations, and the Economic Club of New York. Taylor previously served as the New York Superintendent of Banks from 2003 to 2007. She has also worked at institutions such as Smith Barney, Lehman Brothers, and Donaldson Lufkin & Jenrette. Given her long-term relationship with Michael Bloomberg, she was often referred to as the “First Lady of New York City” during Bloomberg’s tenure as mayor. Michael Bloomberg and Diana Taylor’s relationship history Michael Bloomberg met Diana Taylor when they were seated together at a business luncheon in 2000. Bloomberg, not yet in politics at the time, was there to give a speech. That evening, they happened to dine at the same restaurant. Bloomberg approached Taylor and asked, “Would you like to have a drink after this?” She said yes, and the couple has been inseparable ever since (via Marie Claire). Taylor has stood by Bloomberg through the highs and lows of his political career. When Bloomberg became Mayor of New York City in 2002, Taylor unofficially took on the role of First Lady. The couple has attended numerous social events and political campaigns together. However, despite being in a relationship for over two decades, Taylor and Bloomberg have not officially tied the knot.
